4. Trigger slide by using inclined plane on block
5. Wait for slide completion
6. Stop timing
7. Record time
8. Repeat for both materials
9. Compare times (longer time = more friction)

Starting with material C surface:
>>> deactivate stopwatch <<<  
>>> move block to inclined plane with a unknown material c surface <<<  
>>> activate stopwatch <<<  
>>> use inclined plane with a unknown material c surface on block <<<  
>>> wait1 <<<  
>>> wait1 <<<  
>>> wait1 <<<  
>>> wait1 <<<  
>>> wait1 <<<  
>>> deactivate stopwatch <<
